channel.title: Dataviz on R-Ladies Chicago
channel.description: Recent content in Dataviz on R-Ladies Chicago

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: The data viz study group discusses different ways to visualize data in R. Activities that we’ve done include: > Taking on the monthly r/DataIsBeautiful challenge. > Exploring functionalities of ggplot2 > Visualizing specific data sets Join us on our slack channel #sg-dataviz or email study group coordinator Ola [at] rladies dot org.
